title: New: Chase & Status – Count On Me (Feat. Moko)
body:
I’ll be honest, I’m not huge on **Chase & Status**, but this track featuring our girl **Moko** is pretty special.

With a rapidly growing fanbase, and rumours of a record deal having been signed, you can expect to be hearing **Moko’s** name A LOT more over the coming months. There’s a real old school vibe to _Count On Me_, whilst fitting perfectly into the ‘club-ready’ bracket. Check out _Count On Me_ below, released 29 September.

With a rapidly growing fanbase, and rumours of a record deal having been signed, you can expect to be hearing Moko’s name A LOT more over the coming months. There’s a real old school vibe \[…\]
